short_summary: Window or window blind cleaning services
full_summary:
# W6862-240148 - Window Cleaning Services Tender Announcement

**Procurement Details**

*   Contract Title: W6862-240148 - Window Cleaning Services
*   Solicitation Number: WS4094621328
*   Amendment Number: 3
*   Publication Date: 26 July 2023
*   Tender Closing Date: 21 September 2023, 14:00
*   Amendment Date: 13 September 2023
*   Expected Contract Start Date: 01 December 2023
*   Expected Contract End Date: N/A

**Procurement Category and Method**

*   Procurement Category: SRV (Services)
*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements**

*   This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
    *   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    *   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    *   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
    *   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity and Delivery**

*   Regions of Opportunity: None
*   Regions of Delivery: British Columbia

**Contracting Entity and End-User Entities**

*   Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   End-User Entities: Department of National Defence (DND)
*   Contacts: Cress, Christine (SPAC/PSPC)

**Additional Information**

For more information, please visit: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16988663?extsite=MTY5ODg2NjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==. (French translation available)

## Technical Requirements
None




Please do not hesitate to reach out if you have additional requirements. I will make sure to add to the above response. 

Additional requirements will be tolerated.
